text:
1. Hold drumsticks
2. Strike drumhead with drumsticks
3. Maintain rhythm and tempo
4. Use different drumming techniques (e.g., rolls, fills)
5. Coordinate movements between hands and feet (if using a drum kit)
6. Follow musical cues and changes in the music
7. Express creativity and improvisation through drumming
8. Maintain posture and body control while drumming
9. Listen and respond to other musicians in a band or ensemble setting
10. End the drumming performance with a final strike or flourish.
